titleStmt.title: The burgess ticket of Buckhaven, given to Alexander Bryson within the college thereof, upon the 32, day of Julius Cæsar, 1698. years. Suites call'd, and the court lawfully fenc'd. / By Mother Greg.
titleStmt.author: Mother Greg.

notesStmt.note: At foot of text: With the town seal thereunto affixt. Gideon Wilson. Cls. Burgi de Buckhaveno.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
